sourcesContent:
Search For Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}} remainaing seats
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } constructor() { } SearchResults: FlightRm[] = [ { airline : "American Airlines", remainingNumberOfSeats: 15, departure: { place: "Los Angelos", time: Date.now().toString() }, arrival: { place: "Istanbul", time: Date.now().toString() }, price: "500" }, { airline: "British Airlines", remainingNumberOfSeats: 125, departure: { place: "London", time: Date.now().toString() }, arrival: { place: "Paris", time: Date.now().toString() }, price: "50" }, { airline: "Fly Emirates", remainingNumberOfSeats: 115, departure: { place: "Dubai", time: Date.now().toString() }, arrival: { place: "Lebanon", time: Date.now().toString() }, price: "100" }, { airline: "Australian Airlines", remainingNumberOfSeats: 215, departure: { place: "Dublin", time: Date.now().toString() }, arrival: { place: "New York", time: Date.now().toString() }, price: "5100" } ] } export interface FlightRm { airline: String; arrival: TimePlaceRm; departure: TimePlaceRm; price: String; remainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
